Articles.Content: Hello, my name is Brian im 23, and thanks to a few other members on this forum am now enjoying playing KSP 64bit in Debian with lots of mods, Im mostly a lurker but im trying to be more active when i can find the time, i play alot of different games but the top 3 that i keep coming back to thanks to the modding community is KSP,Minecraft,and the Fallout Series.
Hello Xalos, and welcome to the forum.
